'''Dudo Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Dudo was the son of [[Fosco Baggins]] and [[Ruby Bolger]]. He was the brother of [[Drogo Baggins]] and had a daughter, [[Daisy Baggins|Daisy]]. Dudo, his [[Dora Baggins|sister]], daughter and [[Griffo Boffin|son-in-law]] were guests at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>
